documentation.content:
## Fast Local Build

```bash
.\build.cmd Publish -s
```

## Fast Local Build

```bash
.\build.cmd Pack -s
```

## Generate TMSL/BIM File

```bash
pbi-tools.core generate-bim <folder> [transforms]
```

## Convert Power BI Artifacts Offline

```bash
pbi-tools convert <source> [<outPath>] [<modelSerialization>] [<mashupSerialization>] [<settingsFile>] [<updateSettings>] [<modelOnly>] [<overwrite>]
```

## System Parameters Expansion in pbi-tools Manifest

```json
{
  "parameters": {
    "[Version]": "1.1.0",
    "[Environment]": "{{ENVIRONMENT}}",
    "[PBITOOLS_VERSION]": "{{PBITOOLS_VERSION}}",
    "[GH-Branch]": "%GITHUB_REF_NAME%",
    "[GH-RunId]": "%GITHUB_RUN_ID%",
    "[GH-SHA]": "%GITHUB_SHA%",
    "[FilterDate]": null
  }
}
```

## Embedded Report Deployment with pbi-tools

```json
{
  "options": {
    "dataset": {
      "deployEmbeddedReport": true
    }
  }
}
```

## Embedded Report Deployment with pbi-tools

```json
{
  "UAT": {
    "workspace": "Datasets [PROD]",
    "displayName": "{{PBIXPROJ_FOLDER}} [UAT]",
    "refresh": true,
    "report": {
      "skip": false,
      "workspace": "Name-or-ID",
      "displayName": "Report Name.pbix"
    }
  }
}
```

## Build Project (Linux)

```bash
./build.sh
```

## List Build Targets

```bash
dotnet fake build --list
```

## Non-String Deployment Parameters in pbi-tools

```json
{
    "Number": 1,
    "Number2": 0.4,
    "Null": null,
    "String": "foo",
    "Bool": true,
    "Date": "#date(2022, 6, 1)",
    "Duration": "#duration(5, 0, 0, 0)"
}
```

## Deploy Power BI Artifacts to Service

```bash
pbi-tools deploy <folder> <label> [<environment>] [<basePath>] [<whatIf>]
```

## Build Project (Windows)

```bash
.\build.cmd
```
